### GoC Open Tender - Prefabricated Private Conference Rooms

**General Information**

* **Reference Number**: WS4362861277-Doc4362885445
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-12T14:00:00 (EDIYT - Note EST time zone in description)
* **Notice URL**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18342105?extsite=MTgzNDIxMDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Description**

The Services were contracted by the Department of Veterans Affairs Canada which requires the supply, delivery, and installation of Prefabricated Private Conference Rooms. This National Public Procurement contract aims to provide high quality and fully equipped conference rooms to meet the needs of the Government of Canada for an effective Social Services delivery. 

**procurement details**

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User**: Department of Veterans Affairs (VAC)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Prince Edward Island
* **Contact Person** : Kristelle LeBlanc, PSPC, <kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

**Invoice Approval**
